videos.description: Max Strus puts LaMelo Ball on the floor before draining the 3-pointer.

videos.description: Miles Bridges finds a wide open Isaiah Thomas in the corner for the 3-pointer.

videos.description: Jimmy Butler has the Heat up 10 at the half with this nice midrange move.
